title: New Income-Restricted Apartments in North Minneapolis
app_fee: $45 (per adult applicant). Background checks will be conducted upon application.
posting_body: ['2-Bedroom', '2 Bed, 2 Bath | 1,065 – 1,068 SF | $1,254', 'Opening fall 2022, we are now accepting applications by appointment only.', 'Contact our team for more information and to schedule an appointment to reserve your new home!', 'SAVE THE DATE!', 'Join us at our Intake Meeting Open House on Thursday, August 25th from 8am – 5pm at 800 West Broadway Avenue, Minneapolis, MN 55411.', 'Stop by to meet our team, learn more about Beam, and complete your application to reserve your new home.', 'Visit our website to join our email list to receive future updates and for more information on what to bring with you to complete an application.', 'Stay up-to-date with our community and follow us on Facebook @LiveAtBeam.', 'Beam is your place to shine', ', bringing 72 income-restricted apartment homes and 20 income-restricted townhomes to the community of North Minneapolis.', 'Located on the iconic curve of', 'West Broadway Avenue', 'in the Jordan neighborhood, Beam honors the', 'vibrancy and momentum of the Northside', 'with easy access to neighborhood shopping, public transportation, and downtown Minneapolis amenities.', 'Take the spotlight', 'and choose from our variety of 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartment homes and 3-bedroom townhomes, complete with', 'modern finishes', ', fully equipped kitchen with GE© appliances,', 'in-home washer/dryer,', 'and a private balcony or patio.', 'Expand your living space with', 'indoor/outdoor amenities', 'featuring Club Room with shuffleboard table, Outdoor Patio lounge with grills, Fitness Center, Outdoor Tot Lot, and more.', 'A brighter lifestyle awaits, at Beam.', 'Beam participates in affordable housing programs.', 'Income limits do apply to all homes.', 'Home Amenities', '•\tViews of DT Minneapolis skyline*', '•', 'Balcony or patio', '•\tGE®', 'in-home washer & dryer', '•\tFully equipped kitchen w/', 'sleek GE® appliances', '•\tKitchen', 'island', '•\tDesignated', 'laundry room with storage', '•\tWalk-in closet*', '•\tBuilt-in linen closet(s)', '•\tBathtub', '•\t*in select homes', 'Home Finishes', '•\tModern laminate countertops', '•\tWood-Look', 'LVP flooring', '•\tPlush carpet in bedroom(s)', '•\tMaple espresso cabinetry', '•\tChrome kitchen & bathroom fixtures', '•\tMatte hardware & light fixtures', '•\tMarble windowsills', 'Community Amenities', '•', 'Club Room', 'with shuffleboard and full kitchen', '•\tOutdoor', 'Patio', 'lounge with grill stations', '•\tTwo Resident Lobbies with flex', 'workspace', '•', 'Fitness Center', 'featuring Life Fitness equipment',
